roleset.name: not realizable
roleset.note: IMPRACTICAL-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from impractical.01-j)

example.name: Single arg
example.text: Ron Paul and his Libertarian ideas are at best impractical .
example.arg: Ron Paul and his Libertarian ideas

example.name: Both args
example.text: He is intelligent but impractical for commercial work.

example.name: I know, citations, right?! With It extraposition
example.text: It *EXP* is impractical for me to cite every source of information.
example.arg: to cite every source of information.
